YEEHAA! Just scared like 20 groups of kids, a few of them almost to 
tears! No kidding, either.

Group of 15 year olds came up the driveway, laughed at our traps, 
called us suckers, reached into the candy box.... And screamed their 
heads off when their arms were grabbed! Well worth it, yessss....

Probably a bit childish, but who cares?

Have a great halloween everyone!
